effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Void Bolt at an enemy at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dark Ascension or Void Eruption always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Hitting a Jackpot! grants you 5.0 seconds of Power Infusion. Mind Blast and Void Bolt deal 10% increased damage while Power Infusion is active.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to charge the device and request a Backfill Barrel near your target's location. Damaging the barrel causes it to explode, inflicting 907,437 Fire damage split between nearby enemies.
Equip: Your damaging spells dispatch a spider to spy on your foes, increasing your Intellect by 75 per report received. Stacks up to 40 times. This effect may only occur every 6 sec.
Use: Use your accumulated knowledge to strike when the time is right, granting 695 Intellect per report for 20 sec and consuming their passive effect. (20 Sec Cooldown)
